channel.title: EFF and Tor in Google Summer of Code 2009

item.title: Anonymous Coward ;) (not verified): Comment 1
item.dcterms:creator: Anonymous Coward ;) (not verified)
item.description:
Sorry for posting something OT.
But I found this (half year old) article:
http://news.cnet.com/8301-13578_3-10040152-38.html
Which states that China and the US are trying to develop some kind of ip traceback system. How seriously should one take this article? I mean if such a system ever came into existence wouldn't it make almost anonymity impossible? I thought you at tor project could answer these questions. I don't want to try spread this information if it isn't a serious threat because there are so many other threats to anonymity online which people need to know about.
